user.title: Configure Grid Boost
user.description: Set up the initial configuration for Grid Boost.

data_description.boost_mode: Select the boost mode: automatic, manual, off, or testing.
data_description.grid_boost_manual: Set the manual grid boost value as a percentage (5-99%, suggest 50).
data_description.grid_boost_start: Set the time to start grid boost (suggest 00:02).
data_description.update_hour: Set the hour of the day to perform updates (0-23, suggest 22).
data_description.history_days: Number of days of load history to use for calculations (1-10 days, suggest 4).
data_description.minimum_soc: Set the minimum state of charge (SOC) value as a percentage (5-99%, suggest 15).
